about_the_game:
Busted free from The Lab's control, he's on the run... Bionic Tadpole!
Every bullet has Bionic Tadpole's name on it as he escapes R-Man City in the stolen bionic suit!

Run-n-gun, pick up weapons, use your force shields and jetpack abilities...and always remember to never let your gun overheat. Elements of fun platforming, bullet-hell and twin stick-controlled action, with original music by MaximusCXI, created for each Stage.

Enemy Projectiles



You can even shoot down enemy projectiles! 😳Their bullets act as shields, so it makes sense to pierce through the bullets in order to shoot down the enemies. Increases difficulty and a worthwhile challenge! 🏆

Jetpack Ability



Bionic Tadpole's Jetpack ability allows him to lift off, evading enemy projectiles of all sorts, while still being able to shoot. Twin stick controls make the challenge quite fun during intense moments.

Shields



Bionic Tadpole's shields have a bounce mechanic similar to that of a beach ball🤣! This makes jumping on spikes safe and fun at the same time. 😁

Every bullet has Bionic Tadpole's name on it as he escapes R-Man City in the stolen bionic suit!

Jetpack Ability



Bionic Tadpole's Jetpack ability allows him to lift off, evading enemy projectiles of all sorts, while still being able to shoot. Twin stick controls make the challenge quite fun during intense moments.

name: Bionic Tadpole

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 384 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller or Keyboard and Mouse
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7 or newer
  • Processor: Intel Core i3 or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1 GB VRAM
  • Storage: 384 MB available space
  • Additional Notes: Controller or Keyboard and Mouse

reviews:
“Bionic Tadpole combines several genres into one big, madness-inducing challenge!”
Beta Tested, Game Reviewed

“BT is a throwback to retro 2d platformer/shooters!”
The Paladin Club

“The controls are very smooth, and the mechanics work very well.”
ChaoticFear Indies
short_description: A run-n-gun, non-stop action platformer-shooter! Pick up a weapon. A jetpack. A force shield. All while evading bullet-hell madness! Oh, and be mindful not to let your gun overheat...
